ComicInfo.Summary:
Gopo mistakenly leads the swamp dwellers into politics and disaster.
Typical climax scenes from various movie genres, with untypical endings.
Harry narrates the story of the Nocountessa, as she marries a series of rich men.
ComicInfo.Tags: Mickey Mouse,Josef Stalin,Donald Duck,Goofy,Minnie Mouse,Albert Alligator,Pogo Possum
ComicInfo.Title: Gopo Gossum!; Scenes We'd...Like to See!; Ripup's Believe It or Don't; The Barefoot Nocountessa!
